songs.name: Regular John
lyrics: Bet I know what you're up to
Your home number's on the wall
I just had to call, had to
Who will run with a knife
Two six three, seven eight nine
Cause I'm so bored with myself
Two six three, seven eight nine

songs.name: Avon
lyrics: Through a park in a haze
For traffic going the same way
Some simple ways to let you know
Free range humans all cooped up
Naked clone is playing lame, yeah

songs.name: If Only
lyrics: If it gets you down, well then I'll take it
If it gets you up, well I don't want it
It let you down so broken-hearted
If it gets you down, well then I want it
So blow our mind and make it lazy
Those long long days with no escaping
I hold the wheel to let it go
Don't wanna stop, don't wanna know
If it gets you down, well just don't blame me

songs.name: Walkin' On The Sidewalks
lyrics: Got some action on the other side
So rise and take your oath
I've been programmed as I said before
Words are weightless here on Earth

songs.name: You Would Know
lyrics: You and I cut from same cloth
The devil's got pills in his eyes
My girl's all out of focus
Got cross hairs in his eyes
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh

songs.name: The Bronze
lyrics: Waiting under things that rise in the morning
I've been holding, holding back so long
Take it off my hands, do me a favor
Just fingerfucked and busted up all at once
I'm so lost out on the highway
With no direction left to go
Where it was I started from

songs.name: How To Handle A Rope (A Lesson In The Lariat)
lyrics: Too late to think or filter any more
Maybe you're in a blanket haze of ephedrine
I'm wondering where the hell you been
So come on and right this wrong, the rope
I'd rather open up my wrist, let it go
Because devils and ropes around your neck
Ain't got a mind to deal with any more
If you're not blind and deaf
How can we pollute your head
So come on and right this wrong
And I got it all right
You'd rather open up your wrist, let it go
I got it all right, yeah
There's devils and ropes around my neck

songs.name: Mexicola
lyrics: Setting sun deals hands of gold
And all she said was true
Speak in tongues, speak in lies
It's a wonder that those guns don't point at you
I know just what you mean
In a world that's full of shit and gasoline babe
One dog's dead, one's on the phone
Just leave a lung or leave it alone
It's that same old song again

songs.name: You Can't Quit Me Baby
lyrics: It's a mistake but who knows
This life is a trip when you're psycho in love
Followed your friends, you were not there
Heard what you said and you're laughing maybe
And I do it for you
I want you to notice when I'm not around

songs.name: These Aren't The Droids You're Looking For
Give The Mule What He Wants
lyrics: Be the mule that you gotta be, yeah
Gonna sink it, make 'em think it's too late
Be the mule that you gotta be

songs.name: I Was A Teenage Hand Model
lyrics: That I was tryin' to ignore
Like a spit in the eye
I just peak in the window
The butcher's got a fork in your face and

songs.name: You Think I Ain’t Worth a Dollar, But I Feel Like a Millionaire
lyrics: We play the songs that sound more like everyone else than anyone else
Dead bull with the life from the low
Give me soul and show me the door
Metal heavy, soft at the core
Space truckin', four on the floor
This one's down, gimme some more
Shrunken head I love to adore

songs.name: No One Knows
lyrics: We get some rules to follow
That and this, these and those
We get these pills to swallow
How they stick in your throat
Oh, what you do to me
Of the mind with no hope
A gift that you give to me
Ustedes que son padres de familia...
,…Buenas tardes señores y señoritas aquí está el
DJ Héctor Bonifacio Echevarría Cervantes de la Cruz Arroyo Rojas
Estación donde el rock vive y no muere
Vamos a escuchar un par de temas de Queens of the Stone Age
Primero vamos a escuchar First It Giveth...
,...qué música impresionante temible y verdaderamente ahora van a ver a ver a ver a ver aquí va aquí va aquí va aquí va…

songs.name: First It Giveth
lyrics: I'm in you, now you're in me
You're so cruel, more than me
Loyal to only you, up your sleeve
I want some (Come on, take it)
First, it giveth, then it taketh away
First, it giveth, then it taketh away
First, it giveth, then it taketh away
First, it giveth, then it taketh away
I would beg and I would plead
I'm so young and beautiful (That's right, I'm slick)
First, it giveth, then it taketh away
First, it giveth, then it taketh away
First, it giveth, then it taketh away
First, it giveth, then it taketh away
First, it giveth, then it taketh away
First, it giveth, then it taketh away

songs.name: Song for the Dead
lyrics: It's late enough to go drivin'
Just a track in the line, fuck it
Come on, let's take a little ride

songs.name: The Sky Is Fallin’
lyrics: Oh, in a moment I notice
Cost me so much to hate
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Oh, in a moment I've noticed
Not to go back to the low
That has drained my life so low
That has drained my life so low
That has drained my life so low
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Close your eyes and see the skies are falling
Elastic Ass with ya here in Chino Hills, the last frontier
You know what it spells and you know how we do
Live and direct coming at you from the middle of Nowhere
Ya gotta check this band, Queens Of The Stone Age
If you not knowin', I’m here to let ya know
I'm giving it my stamp of approval, you know what I’m saying?
And we’re gonna spoil the music for ya, this is, um, Millionaire
Um, a song about something they'll never be
All death metal, all the time (All the time)

songs.name: Six Shooter
lyrics: I'm on the side of the road
I'll fucking kill your best friend
What you fucking gonna do? Here I come
Shoot, shoot, shoot, shoot, shoot, shoot
Shoot, shoot, shoot, shoot, shoot, shoot

songs.name: Hangin’ Tree
lyrics: Would you like a way home?
Can you see under my thumb?

songs.name: Go with the Flow
lyrics: She said, I'll throw myself away
I can't make you hang around
I can't wash you off my skin
Outside the frame is what we're leaving out
I can go with the flow
Don't say it doesn't matter (With the flow)
I can go with the flow (I can go)
Do you believe it in your head?
It's so safe to play along
Falling in and out of love
I want something good to die for
To make it beautiful to live
Do you believe it in your head?
I can go with the flow
Don't say it doesn't matter (With the flow)
I can go with the flow (I can go)
Do you believe it in your head?
Do you believe it in your head?
Do you believe it in your head?

songs.name: Gonna Leave You
lyrics: Push it in, break it off
No more pictures, we ain't friends
Push it in, push it in, break it off

songs.name: Do It Again
lyrics: I fall over and over and over
And over, oh, I want you
I get ill, I get ill, I get ill
You're the only one I'm into
I go lower and lower and lower
I don't know, I don't know
All the way, all the way, all the way
There's nowhere left we can meet (Oh)
I'm into what you do but I leave you nowhere
I only get to live one life
Where we all find the way
Down here In Banning College, we’re, uh
Welcome to the South of America
Lay back, sheep, little lamb, little lamb, little lamb
Little lamb, little lamb, little lamb
God told me so to my face (Can not be saved)
Good to know that he’s walking with me
And let him cast the first stone
And you have fallen into the love that needs to be
Hallelujah, y'all, I wanna hear a couple of hallelujahs

songs.name: God Is in the Radio
lyrics: I thought I saw him on the video
A trance is keepin' him under
I know that God is in the radio
The narcotic, from me to you
Just a call in the medium
I know you hear it, I hear it too
They say the devil is paranoid
But God is leaking through the stereo
You believe it, I know you do
You won't admit it or say so
I know that God is in the radio

songs.name: Another Love Song
lyrics: Scream and moan, it chills my soul
Don't want to hear you got left behind
All those times you stayed up and cried
It's no lie, you did it to yourself
Like chewed up gum under my shoe
Don't look surprised, you must've known all along
It's never easy, it's not hard
I'm sick, I'll leave you blind
To leave this love that's left you dry
No need to work this out now
,'Cause you know there's no reason why
I never told you it would last forever
You can't hold this boy for long, dig it
By the time you read my letter
And if you, my pets, learn to listen
I'll let you crawl back in
Here is something you should drop to your knees for, and worship
But you are too stupid to realize yourselves

songs.name: A Song for the Deaf
lyrics: A song for the deaf that is for you
And nobody echoes in my head
I want to take what's left (Ready now)
Come closer, racin' to your tongue
I want to take what's left
What's lost, or save what's left
The blind can go get fucked
Who are you hiding? Is it safe for the deaf?
Yeah, I saw you coming and I heard not a thing
When I knew where you'd been
I want to take what's left
What's lost, or save what's left
The High Desert Wonder Valley favorite radio station

songs.name: Mosquito Song
lyrics: I know, I know the sun is hot
And leave you there all alone
When you walk among the trees
The further I go, the less I know
Fat and soft, pink and weak
Foot and thigh, tongue and cheek
You know I'm told they swallow you whole
Promising you won't feel a thing at all
All of us food that hasn't died
So you scream, whine, and yell
We all will feed the worms and trees
All of us food that hasn't died

lyrics: Nicotine, Valium, Vicodin, marijuana, ecstasy and alcohol
Nicotine, Valium, Vicodin, marijuana, ecstasy and alcohol
Nicotine, Valium, Vicodin, marijuana, ecstasy and alcohol

songs.name: The Lost Art Of Keeping A Secret
lyrics: Well I've got a secret, I cannot say
Blame modern movement to give it away
You've got something, that I understand
Hold it in tightly, call on command
Leap of faith, do you doubt?
Cut you in, I just cut you out
Look for reflections in your face
Out on the corner or locked in your room
I never believe them and I never assume
Stuck in belief, there is a lie
Promise is promise, an eye for an eye
No one can know how we feel
How far I'd go not to say
You know the art isn't gone
And I'm taking our song to the grave

songs.name: Leg Of Lamb
lyrics: You're a head case with a smile
Can't stop to make up your mind
Education is so lame (It's so lame)
When you bitch and you moan
You're a loose girl, I'm a guy (Hey)
You're a truth freak with a lie
In a hotel on the phone
You're gonna leave me, I should've known (Should've known)
And I was thinking, it's so sad
I didn't want you to go, oh
You want to follow the laws of man? (Yes sir)
When there's so much to lose
Infiltrate the walls that are caving in
Infiltrate the walls that are caving in
I'm a sinner, ring my bell (Ring mine)
I'll tell you what, I'd get up
If I knew I had fell

songs.name: Auto Pilot
lyrics: Saw you lyin' there on the marble slab
The best trip that I've ever had
High up in a jet plane, pass it around
My drink's on empty, need another round
I wanna fly, I wanna ride with you
Is this the best that you can do?
I wanna fly, wanna ride with you
High up in a jet plane with you
When we arrive in the middle of nowhere
Don't act like you know I been here so many times
But now that I have, I don't wanna see you no more
High up in a jet plane with you
High up in a jet plane with you
I wanna fly, I wanna ride with you
Is this the best that you can do?
I wanna fly, I wanna ride with you
High up in a jet plane with you
High up in a jet plane with you
High up in a jet plane with you
I wanna fly, I wanna ride with you
Is this the best that you can do?
I wanna fly, wanna ride with you
High up in a jet plane with you
I wanna fly, I wanna ride with you (High up in a jet plane with you)
Is this the best that you can do? (High up in a jet plane with you)
I wanna fly, I wanna ride with you
High up in a jet plane with you
I wanna fly, wanna ride with you (High up in a jet plane with you)
I wanna fly, wanna ride with you (High up in a jet plane with you)

songs.name: Better Living through Chemistry
lyrics: The blue pill opens your eyes, is there a better way?
A new religion's prescribed to those without the faith
A hero holding a knife, and blood is not enough
Is it too late to go back? Is it too late to go?
There's no one here (There's no one here)
Let's see if I'm hearing this right, you suggest I should take
A never-ending supply to carry out the dead
Your idols burn in the fire, the mob comes crawlin' out
I'm reclaiming my mind, destroying everyone
There's no one here (There's no one here)

songs.name: Monsters in the Parasol
lyrics: The walls are closing in again, oh well
The walls are closing in again, oh well
I've seen some things I thought I'd never saw
Paul's dad is warped and bubbling, oh well
Paul's dad is warped and bubbling, oh well
And my mind is out here on another wave
She won't grow, she won't grow
She won't grow, she won't grow
She won't grow, she won't grow
You've got a monster (Distress) in your parasol (Why, yes)
You've got a monster (Divorce) in your parasol (Of course)
You've got a monster (Displeasure) in your parasol (My treasure)
You've got a monster (Your pain) in your parasol (Drives me insane)
Paul's sister is an alien, oh well
Paul's sister is an alien, oh well
I'd seen some things I thought I'd never saw
She won't grow, she won't grow
She won't grow, she won't grow
She won't grow, she won't grow
You've got a monster (Distress) in your parasol (Why, yes)
You've got a monster (Divorce) in your parasol (Of course)
You've got a monster (Displeasure) in your parasol (My treasure)
You've got a hole (Your pain) in you I never saw (Drives me insane)
In your parasol, in your parasol (Insane, insane, insane, insane)

songs.name: Quick and to the Pointless
lyrics: I don't even know what I'm doin' here
A little girl, walkin' down the street
Godverdomme, you gotta be with me
Oh baby, baby, you're so sweet!
Het leven is hard, de mensen worden bang
I'm so old, you're so young
Oh baby, baby, you're so sweet!
Ik denk van ja, maar nee
Little girl, listen to what I say
Oh baby, baby, you're so sweet! Woo!
Ah, ah, baby, baby, you're so sweet

songs.name: In the Fade / Feel Good Hit of the Summer (Reprise)
lyrics: Cracks in the ceiling, crooked pictures in the hall
Countin' and breathin', I'm leavin' here tomorrow
They don't know, I never do you any good
Laughin' is easy, I would if I could
Just live 'til you die, I wanna drown
With nowhere to fall into the arms of someone who
There's nothin' to save and I know
Losin' a feelin' that I couldn't give away
Countin' and breathin', disappearin' in the fade
They don't know, I'd never do you any good
Stoppin' and stayin', I would if I could
Just live 'til you die, I wanna drown
With nowhere to fall into the arms of someone who
There's nothin' to save and I know

songs.name: Tension Head
lyrics: Every day I wake up feelin' this way
With all the action goin' down
I strike a match! Strike a match, cook it up!
Gotta get out and get right
Gotta get out, gotta get out and get right!
Gotta get out, I gotta get out no more

songs.name: I Think I Lost My Headache
lyrics: They called and just let it ring
The door was open, I swear
Ain't no use in pickin' up
It's all my head, I know
Oh, but I knew it would
Medicate just to make you soft
What the hell were they thinkin' of?
It's all my head, I know
